comments.en:
Large format (A3/11x17) colour laser printer

Epson provides a free (LGPL) driver for this printer. With this the printer works to its full extent.

A scanning add-on for this printer is available, so that one can make an multi-function device (printing, scanning, copying) out of it.

Maximum paper width: 12.9 inches / 32.8 cm (Wide format printer)

Printing engine speed: 6 pages/min
